law.text: Every person subject to KRS 337.420 to 337.433 and 337.990(14) shall keep an abstract or copy of KRS 337.420 to 337.433 and 337.990(14) posted in a conspicuous place in or about the premises where any employee is employed. Employers shall be furnished copies or abstracts of KRS 337.420 to 337.433 and 337.990(14) by the state on request without charge.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 7.
